sources: Rochon PA, Gurwitz JH. The prescribing cascade revisited. Lancet. 2017;389(10081):1778-1780.
Kalisch Ellett LM, et al. Prescribing cascades: an overlooked cause of polypharmacy in older adults. J Am Geriatr Soc. 2014.
McCarthy LM, et al. Prescribing cascades in community-dwelling older adults: a systematic review. BMC Geriatrics. 2022.
_metadata.definition: A prescribing cascade occurs when a new medication is prescribed to treat an adverse drug reaction (ADR) that was mistakenly interpreted as a new medical condition.

cascades.name: CCB → Peripheral Edema → Diuretic
cascades.recommendation: Consider dose reduction of CCB or switch to ACE inhibitor/ARB. Edema is dose-dependent side effect, not heart failure.

cascades.name: Cholinesterase Inhibitor → Urinary Incontinence → Anticholinergic
cascades.recommendation: Anticholinergic directly opposes cholinesterase inhibitor. Worsens cognition in dementia patients. Consider behavioral interventions or mirabegron.

cascades.name: NSAID → Hypertension → Antihypertensive
cascades.recommendation: Discontinue NSAID if possible. Switch to acetaminophen or topical NSAID. Blood pressure often normalizes after NSAID discontinuation.
cascades.pgx_relevance: CYP2C9 poor metabolizers have increased NSAID exposure and higher hypertension risk

cascades.name: Metoclopramide → Parkinsonism → Levodopa
cascades.recommendation: Discontinue metoclopramide. Parkinsonian symptoms typically resolve within weeks to months. Avoid unnecessary antiparkinson therapy.

cascades.name: Thiazide Diuretic → Hyperuricemia/Gout → Allopurinol/Colchicine
cascades.recommendation: Consider switching antihypertensive if gout is new-onset after thiazide initiation. Losartan has mild uricosuric effect.

cascades.name: SSRI → GI Bleeding → PPI
cascades.recommendation: If GI symptoms appeared after SSRI initiation, consider switching to SNRI or mirtazapine. Long-term PPI has own risks (fractures, C. diff, hypomagnesemia).
cascades.pgx_relevance: CYP2C19 poor metabolizers have increased SSRI exposure. CYP2D6 status affects paroxetine and fluoxetine levels.

cascades.name: Antipsychotic → Parkinsonism → Anticholinergic Antiparkinson
cascades.recommendation: Consider dose reduction of antipsychotic or switch to agent with lower EPS risk (quetiapine, aripiprazole). Adding anticholinergic worsens cognitive outcomes in elderly.
cascades.pgx_relevance: CYP2D6 poor metabolizers have increased haloperidol and risperidone exposure, increasing EPS risk

cascades.name: Opioid → Constipation → Laxative Escalation
cascades.recommendation: Prophylactic laxative recommended with opioid initiation. If escalating laxatives needed, reassess opioid necessity and consider non-opioid alternatives.
cascades.pgx_relevance: CYP2D6 ultra-rapid metabolizers convert codeine/tramadol to active metabolites faster, potentially worsening constipation

cascades.name: Statin → Myalgia → Pain Medication
cascades.recommendation: Consider switching statin (pravastatin, fluvastatin have lower myopathy risk). NSAID adds GI and renal risk. Address root cause.
cascades.pgx_relevance: SLCO1B1 variants increase statin exposure and myopathy risk. Genotype-guided statin selection can prevent cascade.

cascades.name: ACE Inhibitor → Cough → Cough Suppressant/Antibiotic
cascades.recommendation: ACE inhibitor cough occurs in 5-20% of patients. Switch to ARB (losartan, valsartan). Do not treat cough with suppressants or antibiotics.

cascades.name: Corticosteroid → Hyperglycemia → Antidiabetic
cascades.recommendation: If corticosteroid is being tapered or can be discontinued, hyperglycemia may resolve. Avoid adding long-acting sulfonylureas for steroid-induced glucose spikes.

cascades.name: Gabapentinoid → Peripheral Edema → Diuretic
cascades.recommendation: Edema is known side effect of gabapentinoids. Consider dose reduction or switch to duloxetine for neuropathic pain rather than adding diuretic.

cascades.name: Bisphosphonate → GERD → PPI
cascades.recommendation: Ensure proper administration (upright for 30 min, full glass of water). Consider switching to IV bisphosphonate or denosumab. Chronic PPI may reduce bisphosphonate absorption.

cascades.name: Antidepressant → Weight Gain → Antidiabetic/Weight Loss Drug
cascades.recommendation: Consider switching to weight-neutral antidepressant (sertraline, bupropion). Address root cause before adding metabolic medications.
cascades.pgx_relevance: CYP2D6 status affects paroxetine and amitriptyline metabolism; poor metabolizers at higher risk of weight gain due to increased drug exposure

cascades.name: Diuretic → Hypokalemia → Potassium Supplement
cascades.recommendation: Consider adding potassium-sparing diuretic (spironolactone) instead of supplementation, or reassess diuretic necessity. If diuretic was added for CCB edema, both could potentially be removed.
